title: "Projects"
description: |
  Proyectos de Ciencia de Datos
---

```{r, echo=FALSE,warning=FALSE}
suppressPackageStartupMessages({
  library(dplyr)
  library(reactable)
})
data_in <- tibble::tribble(
  ~Project, ~url, ~Description,
  "Matemática para Machine Learning en R", "https://github.com/zpio/R-Math-Machine-Learning", "Apuntes de Algebra Lineal y Cálculo en R",
  "Introducción a Git y GitHub", "https://github.com/zpio/Intro-Git-GitHub", "Apuntes Introductorio de Git y GitHub"
) 
data_in %>%
  reactable::reactable(
    searchable = TRUE,
    pagination = FALSE,
    columns = list(
      Project = colDef(
        minWidth = 150,
        cell = function(value, index) {
          url_in <- data_in$url[index]
          htmltools::a(href = url_in, value)
        }
      ),
      url = colDef(show = FALSE),
      #Type = colDef(minWidth = 115),
      Description = colDef(minWidth = 250)
    ),
    theme = reactableTheme(
      borderColor = "#dfe2e5",
      stripedColor = "#f6f8fa",
      highlightColor = "#f0f5f9",
      cellPadding = "8px 12px",
      style = list(fontFamily = "-apple-system, Lato, sans-serif"),
    )
  )
```
